abstract: The bank falsely stated on one of its websites that its private bank advisers were paid based on their performance for clients, regulators said.
snippet: The bank falsely stated on one of its websites that its private bank advisers were paid based on their performance for clients, regulators said.
lead_paragraph: Regulators have fined J.P. Morgan Securities $4 million for making false statements on the client website of its private bank and in its marketing materials about how its private bank advisers are paid.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan Securities Fined $4 Million for False Statements to Clients
headline.print_headline: J.P. Morgan Securities Fined $4 Million for False Statements to Clients
